title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Context-Based Digital Literacy Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute a language analysis project using digital tools and generate data visualization outputs.
Learners can effectively communicate with team members on an online collaboration platform and manage project schedules and roles.
Learners can critically analyze the credibility of language learning materials by applying digital resource evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
